item.title: The HMO at number 5 has dumped rubbish outside house, 23rd January
item.description:

item.title: Constant fly tipping at or by the fence at the entrance to Cossall Park, 23rd January
item.description:
Constant fly tipping since i moved here 8 years ago, the 'no fly tipping' sign makes no difference. Can you install a CCTV camera and fine the offenders? Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woodland Trail, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter/flytipping, 23rd January
item.description:
We have collected 5 blue sacks of litter plus 6 gas canisters, an old chair , a bucket and a metal pole. Please can you arrange for removal. This is in the usual place whete footpath 106 meets Barnes Cray road

item.title: Deep pot hole, 23rd January
item.description:
This morning my car went into this deep pot hole. It caused me to swerve into oncoming traffic. Thankfully there was no collision. However, it has caused a flat tyre on my vehicle. This is extremely dangerous and could have caused a massive accident. Someone needs to fix this immediately as it is a danger to life. I now have to get my car fixed. Hopefully its just the tyre and not suspension damage.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ashfield Lane, Chislehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter by bench, 23rd January
item.description:
Litter by bench along public foot path, a side path on Martin's Hill towards the Glassmill Lane end. There is often litter here. A bin by the bench would be helpful.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Glassmill Lane, Shortlands, Greater London

item.title: Disturbance to communal area and rubbish stored in communal area, 23rd January
item.description:
Someone has removed rubbish from the communal bins and placed it in the building’s shared communal area, claiming it is their “artwork”. This is unhygienic and unsafe. This is a communal area but we are unable to use it. Please resolve this asap

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hertford Road, Hackney, London
